title: Security and Software hi tec feeling font
content:
Im looking for a font for a logo. The letters involved are DETECT and the company produces both the hardware (home security alarm) and the software for the alarm/security industri. So the font needs to have a feeling of both Security and Software development. I would be greatfull to hear your thoughts and ideas about this. Thank you.  
Petter
author: P_P

comments.content:
DTL Argo could work beautifully

[http://www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/Argo\_rdrct.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014041000/http:/www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/Argo_rdrct.html "http://www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/Argo\_rdrct.html")

Perhaps 'Detect' would look nicer than 'DETECT'

Try Univers also - possibly Black Expanded (or even Black Condensed!)

G'luck
Thank you all for your suggestions. I think that Sansa, Etelka and DTL Argo will work very nice.
